gw.api.databuilder

Class DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder

  • public class DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a set of entities that make up one DirectBillPayment. This builder creates the specified set of related entities and assembles them into the DirectBillPayment.

    Example: DirectBillPayment directBillPayment = new DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder() .withFullPaymentForInvoice(theInvoice) .createFixture() .getDirectBillPayment();

    • Method Detail

      • withFullPaymentForInvoice

        public DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder withFullPaymentForInvoice(@Nonnull
                                                        Invoice invoice)
        Creates distItems to fully pay each of the invoice items in the invoice. Sets the payer to be the payer of the invoice if no payer is otherwise specified.

      • withFullPaymentForInvoiceItems

        public DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder withFullPaymentForInvoiceItems(InvoiceItem... invoiceItems)
        Creates distItems to fully pay each of the invoice items. Sets the payer to be the payer of the first invoice item if no payer is otherwise specified.

      • withFullPaymentForCharge

        public DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder withFullPaymentForCharge(@Nonnull
                                                       Charge charge)
        Creates distItems to fully pay each of the invoice items on the Charge. Sets the payer to be the payer of the first invoice item if no payer is otherwise specified.

      • withFullPaymentForInvoiceItem

        public DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder withFullPaymentForInvoiceItem(@Nonnull
                                                            InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
        Creates a distItem to fully pay the invoice item. Sets the payer to be the payer of the invoice item's invoice if no payer is otherwise specified.

      • withPartialPaymentForInvoiceItem

        public DirectBillPaymentFixtureBuilder withPartialPaymentForInvoiceItem(@Nonnull
                                                               InvoiceItem invoiceItem,
                                                               @Nonnull
                                                               MonetaryAmount amount)
        Creates a distItem to pay the invoice item a given amount. Sets the payer to be the payer of the invoice item's invoice if no payer is otherwise specified.

                                                 UnappliedFund unappliedFund)
        The payment will use the supplied unapplied. If none is specified, we will use default unapplied
        Parameters:
        unappliedFund - The unapplied fund to use when making this payment
        Returns:
